Items.Title: HSBC Black Credit Card
Items.Summary: The top-of-the-line HSBC Black MasterCard® Credit Card is designed to provide you with experiences that you'll cherish for the rest of your life. From travel to culinary experiences, culture and shopping there's no limit to where the benefits can take you.
Items.CircleTitleTwoDescription: Unlimited access at over 500 premium airport lounges worldwide provided by LoungeKeyTM

Benefits.Title: 250,000 Bonus Air Miles
Benefits.Content: Receive 250,000 joining bonus Air Miles

Benefits.Title: Golf Privileges
Benefits.Content: Exclusive golfing privileges at the Al Badia Golf Club by InterContinental Dubai Festival City

Benefits.Title: Lounge Access
Benefits.Content: Unlimited access at over 500 premium airport lounges worldwide provided by LoungeKeyTM

Benefits.Title: Air Miles Rewards Program
Benefits.Content: Air Miles rewards that can be redeemed for flights with any airline, at any time to any destination

Benefits.Title: Entertainer & I Love Dining
Benefits.Content: Free download of our 'Buy 1 Get 1 Free' mobile app with over 8,000 offers across 15 countries

• 250,000 Bonus Air Miles
  • Golf Privileges
  • Lounge Access
  • Air Miles Rewards Program
  • Entertainer & I Love Dining

Items.Title: HSBC Premier Credit Card
Items.Summary: Whether you're at home or travelling, your HSBC Premier Credit Card is part of your seamless banking experience, providing you with a complete range of exclusive benefits covering dining, shopping, travel and entertainment.
Items.CircleTitleOneDescription: Enjoy your HSBC Premier Credit Card without any annual membership fees

Items.Title: HSBC Platinum Cashback Card
Items.Summary: The ultimate utility card if you’re looking for one. With the HSBC Platinum Cashback card, get guaranteed cashback of up to 10% on all your credit card spends. And that’s just the beginning. Enjoy special offers and rewards on your day-to-day activities, like ‘buy 1 get 1 free’ ticket at VOX cinemas or special discounts at over 100 restaurants in the UAE.
